title: Torque - comparing same force at different points

content.question: Which of the following correctly compares the net torques <math alttext="tau sub A" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <msub> <mi>τ</mi> <mtext>A</mtext> </msub> </mstyle> </math>, <math alttext="tau sub B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="tau sub C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>, exerted on wheels <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi> </math>, respectively, about their centers?

choices.label: <math alttext="tau sub A equals tau sub B, which equals tau sub C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, tau sub A equals tau sub B, close parenthesis, is greater than tau sub C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub A is greater than open parenthesis, tau sub B equals tau sub C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub A is greater than tau sub B, which is greater than tau sub C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="tau sub A is greater than tau sub B, which is greater than tau sub C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
